config.title: Vibe Notes
config.copyForLLMPrompt.description: Prompt text to prepend when copying notes for AI/LLM. Leave empty to copy without additional prompt.
config.copyForLLMPrompt.markdownDescript:
Prompt text to prepend when copying notes for AI/LLM. Leave empty to copy without additional prompt.

**Default:** `Please review and implement the following code feedback:`

**Note:** To restore the default value, click the ⚙️ gear icon and select `Reset Setting`.
config.copyForLLMIncludeCode.description: Include code snippets when copying notes for AI/LLM. Disable to reduce token usage.
config.copyForLLMIncludeCode.markdownDes:
Include actual source code snippets when copying notes for AI/LLM.

**When enabled:** Notes include the actual code being referenced, providing full context.

**When disabled:** Only note comments are included, token usage can be reduced.
config.showMarkdownPreamble.description: Show instructional preamble in markdown files
config.showMarkdownPreamble.markdownDesc:
Show instructional preamble with editing tips and generation date at the top of markdown files.

**When enabled:** Markdown files include helpful instructions and metadata.

**When disabled:** Markdown files start directly with notes content.
config.editorSplitMode.description: How to split the editor when opening note editing window
config.editorSplitMode.markdownDescripti:
Controls how the editor window is split when opening a note for editing.

**Options:**
- `none`: Opens in the current editor
- `horizontal`: Splits the editor horizontally (default)
- `vertical`: Splits the editor vertically
